properties.areaDesc: Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays; Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; New York Harbor; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 6 at 3:40PM EST until February 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 45 kt. Seas
3 to 6 feet expected on Long Island Sound.

* WHERE...The Long Island Sound, New York Harbor, Peconic and
Gardiners Bays, and South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through
Shinnecock Bay.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 1 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY
